---
id: resend-email-invitations
title: "Resend the room invitations"
description: "Resends the email invitations to a room with the ID specified in the request to the selected users."

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Resend the room invitations"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/rooms/{id}/resend"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Resends the email invitations to a room with the ID specified in the request to the selected users.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"The room ID.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":9846}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"The user invitation parameters.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"usersIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"The list of user IDs.","nullable":true,"example":["75a5f745-f697-4418-b38d-0fe0d277e258"]},"resendAll":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether to resend all user invitations or not.","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The user invitation parameters.","title":"UserInvitation"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Ok"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
